task.title: Export TMX
task.shortdesc: Steps for exporting a translation memory as TMX using RemoteTM's web interface.

context.p: RemoteTM memories can be exported as TMX files either using Swordfish, its REST API or RemoteTM's own web interface. Using RemoteTM's web interface is faster.

step.cmd: Select a memory on the main list by clicking on it.

taskbody.result: RemoteTM exports the selected memory as TMX and once the export finishes, the TMX file is downloaded by the browser.
